submissionId.description: The ID of the DataAccessSubmission submitted for the given AccessRequirement.

submittedBy.description: The user who submitted the DataAccessSubmission for the given AccessRequirement.

rejectedReason.description: The reason the submission is rejected, if it's rejected.

state.description: The state of the submitted DataAccessSubmission, or NOT_SUBMITTED if none was submitted.

modifiedOn.description: The date the DataAccessSubmission' status was last modified.
